name: rbac-ubac-module
description: RBAC/UBAC Module - Monorepo for all services

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd nmbp-admin-backend && npm install && cd ../nmbp-admin-frontend && npm install && cd ../nmbp-admin-profile-backend && npm install && cd ../nmbp-auth-backend && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:admin-backend" "npm run start:admin-frontend" "npm run start:user-backend" "npm run start:auth-backend"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "ADMIN-BE,ADMIN-FE,USER-BE,AUTH-BE" -c "bgBlue,bgGreen,bgYellow,bgMagenta" "npm run start:admin-backend" "npm run start:admin-frontend" "npm run start:user-backend" "npm run start:auth-backend"
